[Home](./index.md) &gt; [@textile/hub](./hub.md) &gt; [Client](./hub.client.md)

## Client class

Client is a web-gRPC wrapper client for communicating with a webgRPC-enabled Textile server. This client library can be used to interact with a local or remote Textile gRPC-service It is a wrapper around Textile's 'DB' API, which is defined here: https://github.com/textileio/go-threads/blob/master/api/pb/api.proto.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare class Client 
```

## Constructors

|  Constructor | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [(constructor)(context)](./hub.client._constructor_.md) |  | Creates a new gRPC client instance for accessing the Textile Threads API. |

## Methods

|  Method | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [create(threadID, collectionName, values)](./hub.client.create.md) |  | Creates a new model instance in the given store. |
|  [delete(threadID, collectionName, IDs)](./hub.client.delete.md) |  | Deletes an existing model instance from the given store. |
|  [deleteCollection(threadID, name)](./hub.client.deletecollection.md) |  | deleteCollection deletes an existing collection. |
|  [deleteDB(threadID)](./hub.client.deletedb.md) |  | Deletes an entire DB. |
|  [find(threadID, collectionName, query)](./hub.client.find.md) |  | find queries the store for entities matching the given query parameters. |
|  [findByID(threadID, collectionName, ID)](./hub.client.findbyid.md) |  | findByID queries the store for the id of an instance. |
|  [getCollectionIndexes(threadID, name)](./hub.client.getcollectionindexes.md) |  | getCollectionIndexes returns an existing collection's indexes. |
|  [getDBInfo(threadID)](./hub.client.getdbinfo.md) |  | getDBInfo returns invite 'links' unseful for inviting other peers to join a given store/thread. |
|  [getToken(identity, ctx)](./hub.client.gettoken.md) |  | Obtain a token for interacting with the remote API. |
|  [getTokenChallenge(publicKey, callback, ctx)](./hub.client.gettokenchallenge.md) |  | Obtain a token for interacting with the remote API. |
|  [has(threadID, collectionName, IDs)](./hub.client.has.md) |  | has checks whether a given instance exists in the given store. |
|  [listDBs()](./hub.client.listdbs.md) |  | Lists all known DBs. |
|  [listen(threadID, filters, callback)](./hub.client.listen.md) |  | listen opens a long-lived connection with a remote node, running the given callback on each new update to the given instance. The return value is a <code>close</code> function, which cleanly closes the connection with the remote node. |
|  [newCollection(threadID, name, schema, indexes)](./hub.client.newcollection.md) |  | newCollection registers a new collection schema under the given name. The schema must be a valid json-schema.org schema, and can be a JSON string or object. |
|  [newCollectionFromObject(threadID, name, obj, indexes)](./hub.client.newcollectionfromobject.md) |  | newCollectionFromObject creates and registers a new collection under the given name. The input object must be serializable to JSON, and contain only json-schema.org types. |
|  [newDB(threadID, name)](./hub.client.newdb.md) |  | newDB creates a new store on the remote node. |
|  [newDBFromAddr(address, key, collections)](./hub.client.newdbfromaddr.md) |  | newDBFromAddr initializes the client with the given store, connecting to the given thread address (database). It should be called before any operation on the store, and is an alternative to start, which creates a local store. newDBFromAddr should also include the read and follow keys, which should be Buffer, Uint8Array or base58-encoded strings. See <code>getDBInfo</code> for a possible source of the address and keys. |
|  [randomIdentity()](./hub.client.randomidentity.md) | <code>static</code> | Create a random user identity. |
|  [readTransaction(threadID, collectionName)](./hub.client.readtransaction.md) |  | readTransaction creates a new read-only transaction object. See ReadTransaction for details. |
|  [save(threadID, collectionName, values)](./hub.client.save.md) |  | Saves changes to an existing model instance in the given store. |
|  [updateCollection(threadID, name, schema, indexes)](./hub.client.updatecollection.md) |  | updateCollection updates an existing collection. Currenrly, updates can include name and schema.  Allow update of indexing information. |
|  [withUserAuth(auth, host, debug)](./hub.client.withuserauth.md) | <code>static</code> | Create a new gRPC client instance from a supplied user auth object. Assumes all default gRPC setttings. For custimization options, use a context object directly. |
|  [withUserKey(key, host, debug)](./hub.client.withuserkey.md) | <code>static</code> | Create a new gRPC client instance from a supplied key and secret |
|  [writeTransaction(threadID, collectionName)](./hub.client.writetransaction.md) |  | writeTransaction creates a new writeable transaction object. See WriteTransaction for details. |
